mapper.sql: person_id, person_name, person_code, person_sex, person_phone, person_remark, level_id, department1_id, department2_id, person_remark1, person_remark2, person_remark3, person_remark4, logic_delete, created_by, updated_by, created_time, updated_time, conf_region_id, conf_dept_id
mapper.update:
update ass_level
person_name = #{person_name},
person_code = #{person_code},
person_sex = #{person_sex},
person_phone = #{person_phone},
logic_delete = #{logic_delete},
created_by = #{created_by},
updated_by = #{updated_by},
created_time = #{created_time},
updated_time = #{updated_time},
conf_region_id = #{conf_region_id},
conf_dept_id = #{conf_dept_id},
where level_id = #{level_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
